title: PAU Notification 2025 - Apply Offline for Data Entry Operator Posts
description: The Punjab Agricultural University (PAU) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Data Entry Operator Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.Sc., M.Sc., and MCA can apply for the PAU Notification 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, applicat...
